QuestData.Title: A Friend Indeed
QuestData.Description:
My friend, every day with you is a new adventure.
I am sorry your ships crashed, but I am so happy we met!
I heard a rumor, that Atolia found some more goods!
We should swing by and see what she has this time!
QuestData.LogDescription: Visit Atolia Seapearl, in Newhome, for your gift.
